Product Name: Back to MLILY Essence Sleep 10" Twin XL Size Memory Foam Mattress
Title: This king sized mattress is extremely comfortable
Review Text: I liked the ease of setting it up.  It did expand to the full 14‚Äù (I allowed 60 hours before sleeping on it.  I did need two neighbors to carry it up my stairs as it weighs 104 lbs. Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: BHG Swivel chair
Review Text: Myself and all my guests love this chair! Great price. Looks great and is truly comfortable for long periods of time. If you aren't a fan of lower furniture then it might not be for you. However, it is higher than a lot of other swivel chairs I tried out before taking a chance on this one.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Preteen dream chair
Review Text:
Loved the boucle material!  It's adorable and looks high end.  No one would ever believe it came from Walmart.  It was delivered as is so no assembly was required. I thought that was a big bonus.

The chair is small and sits very low. That actually works very well for my preteen daughter and the size of her room. I am 5‚Äò1inches tall and the chair is very comfortable for me. We have had it for about six months and have not had any issues with the chair.  it swivels very nicely And it's pretty comfortable

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: The Mira Swivel Chair is beautiful!
Review Text: The delivery experience was impressive! Delivered on the date assigned and at my front door! That's a big win within itself because I live in an apartment complex on the second floor! I purchased two chairs in preparation for the holiday. Upon arrival they were packaged for protection. Each chair was completely wrapped in a triple layer of protection, with a thin layer of wood on the base of the box to protect the foam wrapped swivel base.  The pile of the fabric is soft and plush and the seat cushion fits like a glove. The low profile of the chair allows for an aesthetically pleasing, clear view of the room and the swivel base allows users to participate in conversations held in multiple areas of the space. I am so excited about the design...

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: High end look for a low price!
Review Text: So impressed with the quality of this chair for the price! I happened to catch this on major sale and bought 2. Love them! They are surprisingly comfortable! Not a lot of padding on the back but a throw pillow can help with that. Swivel smoothly. Packaged really well too. A little bit of a funky smell when you open it up but it already started to fade on day 2. Low profile and on the smaller side but cute and comfy. Just check the dimensions so you aren't surprised.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Comfortable %26 Cute
Review Text: This chair is beyond adorable and more affordable than most swivel chairs! I only have just gotten it so I don't know how it will hold up against my cats yet but they seem to think it's as comfortable as I do. It is lower than some sitting chairs but that doesn't really bother me. Perfect for my master bedroom corner.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Love these!!!
Review Text: I added these as additional sitting space. I would definitely measure height and make sure it matches any other couch you may have. For me it's a little lower than main couch but I will still keep them because I love how comfy these are :) my daughter is obsessed with the spin factor. These are very easy to move to clean, etc. highly recommend. These are very similar to the west elm option but for almost $1600.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Great chair!!!
Review Text: I was skeptical about getting this but this was a great purchase! It got delivered in 2 days and chair came completely set up in the box. It's a nice cream color and matched well with what I was going for. I definitely would buy this again if I needed to replace the current one I just bought since it's affordable. Seat is bouncy and comfortable my daughter loves it especially the swivel, it's very smooth.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Stylish  Chic and Affordable ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Review Text: Great quality and super stylish! Love this chair!  I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect with this purchase but I have to say this chair is fabulous. Heavy, solid construction, great fabric, smooth and quiet 360 spin and double sided cushion. Do read the measurements (it is not a high back) my only retreat is that I order one to start and now they are out of stock again. Will be purchasing a second as soon as available. I plan to set up in my bedroom for a sitting area. Love this piece.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Perfect for our nursery
Review Text: Love this chair for our nursery!  Yes - it's a bit on the small size (per other reviews), but that's exactly what I wanted.  Doesn't rock but does swivel.  Perfect size and softness for reading to my baby, and it will become his chair as he grows bigger.  The seat is a bit stiff, but honestly I think cushy seats are difficult to get out of.  Not good if you have a child in yours lap.  Great price point for this chair.  Thank you Walmart for carrying trendy, affordable furniture!

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: perfection.
Review Text: honestly, an amazing alternative if the drew barrymore one is not within budget. i could swear this chair was high end. for the original price, i would skip but i bought it at $100 off and absolutely love it. it's so comfortable, the swivel is nice and smooth, i can easily cross my legs and fit my body in the chair. with an ottoman, i can definitely see myself napping in this chair. the shipping was STELLAR as well. i literally got it delivered the next after i placed my order. the entire experience of this chair was just perfection. the only thing im mad about, is that i didn't get a second one.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream
Title: Attractive and Cozy
Review Text: Absolutely love these swivel chairs. They look great and are comfortable. They are wide, which is a plus, enables you to sit crisscross or feet up, even my 6' husband fits well in them. They are a little deep, so a decorative pillow helps for shorter people like me.

Product Name: Back to Better Homes & Gardens Mira Swivel Chair, Cream

Buy your phones on Amazon or in your carriers store. 
My question is why would I want to go to a store to activate a phone(even if it did work) after buying a phone online. I know everyone's reasons for buying online are different, by for me, it was to keep from going to the store in the first place.

Product Name: Back to AT&T Samsung Galaxy A14 5G, 64GB Black - Prepaid Smartphone
Title: Do not purchase from website
Review Text:
Device is fine for the cost, but DO NOT PURCHASE FROM WALMART.COM. 

Device is not activated so AT%26T flags it as stolen and locks your account. Both at%26t and Wal-Mart chatbot say to take it to the store for activation. Defeats the purpose of ordering it online.

Three different Wal-Mart locations and none had a clue how to activate the device since they didn't sell it. Suggestions ranged from turn it off then on, buy a new SIM card, and return it then repurchase it. 

If you want a decent phone for the money, this is a good option. Just DON'T BUY IT ONLINE. Go to a brick and mortar store, it will save you time and headaches.

Product Name: Back to AT&T Samsung Galaxy A14 5G, 64GB Black - Prepaid Smartphone
Title: Decent phone, lacking camera quality, fast battery
Review Text: So far, the Samsung Galaxy A14 5G is not that bad. It has a great battery life. It lasts me around 18 hours with all day use of texting, social media, etc. It is pretty fast at switching screens. The only con I've noticed about the A14 is the basic camera (too white, too much exposure, comparable to older model galaxies). Another con about this phone is when you are playing mobile games, it can get laggy. Overall, if you are looking for a low-budget phone with a great battery life and fast response time, look no further. This one gives you what you need for a cheap price.

Product Name: Back to Straight Talk Samsung Galaxy A14, 5G, 64GB, Black - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
Title: 2 Month Review..Not Sponsored
Review Text: 2 Month Review: This phone is a steal for about 100 bucks. It's the best A series phone ever made by Samsung. The screen is huge, crisp, and smooth with a 90Hz refresh rate. And it is 5G, you can browse faster and play games with little to no lag in my experience. The phone is tough and can take a fall, but it's kind of thick and heavy, so it might not fit in some pockets especiallywith a case on it. The material feels of plastic, but it looks good and feels solid in the hand. The battery has a decent capacity and lasts all day even with moderate use. It comes with a very thick and durable silicone case that is drop proof, and has rotatable kickstand on the back so it can stand up in portrait or landscape orientations. 

Once set up with a kids account, it primarily runs the google kids space to keep the kids contained inside and limit the apps and sites they have access to, and require approval for new downloads, purchases, etc. You could set it up for normal use if you choose to.

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: amazing tablet
Review Text: The handle on the back of the device is useful for both a stand and when the kids want to hold it. The case protects the tablet when our kids have dropped it and also gives them nice traction while holding it. The clarity is perfect so they don't need to hold the tablet right in front of their face.

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: Great for kids!
Review Text: This tablet is amazing! The screen is large and the picture quality is amazing. Comes with a nice case. This tablet works great for games, surfing,watching videos and much more  enough to keep kids busy. Quick charge and battery lasts a long time. Overall great and i highly recommend it.

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: Great for guided use for kids!
Review Text:
You can set this up as a regular tablet or a kids tablet. Note that the screen resolution is low but clear enough for kid's use.

It came with the protective case already installed, the case also comes with a built-in stand on the back. If you opt to use without case, the back part of the tablet is slip and fingerprint-resistant.

Setup is easy, all you need is a gmail account. My son is not able to use apps other than the ones I allowed access too. You can also set a schedule when you are able to access the tablet and the duration. I had mine set to one hour of use each day, between 5pm to 8pm only. Works great!

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: Pink Onn Tablet
Review Text: I received the Onn 10 inch Pink tablet to try came with a case and stand it is different from what ive used before and it works great has the kid feature so u can set contols for what your kids watch and how long it stays on love the fact that it is android and gives u recommended things/videos for hou child in the age range love it not hard 2 work and is easy 2 use.Has 32gb of storage.

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: Great working tablet for kids

The setup was quick and easy, it linked up to my google ac account and the case has a built in stand. The pad works quick and the quality is great, I highly recommend.

Product Name: Back to onn. 10.1" Kids Tablet, 32GB (2022 Model),  2.0 GHz Quad-Core Processor, Jade Ming
Title: My granddaughter loves this
Review Text: I got this for my granddaughter so that she would leave my tablet alone and she absolutely loves it, she feels like a big girl now, this is a really good quality tablet that is kid friendly and with kid friendly apps already preloaded, I love the 10.1 screen, it's the perfect size for my granddaughter, it has Android 12 operating system and My granddaughter finds it easy to use, it also comes with Google kids space, entertainment space and a camera from Google apps, and parental controls which I really love, this has definitely kept my granddaughter busy for hours, she loves it and so do I, I definitely recommend

Title: Fair

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Don't expect much from $20 earbuds.
Review Text: Don't by these $20 wireless earbuds expecting them to perform like an expensive pair, because they certainly will not.  You are getting what you pay for.  The directions are poor, and includes every language under the sun, but no real details.    I still don't know how to increase or decrease the volume, for example, and that was after checking their website for more information.  I will try them for a few hours to determine if they are really worth the $20 or not, and decide whether to return them or keep them.  My Apple Air Pods put them to shame, but they cost 10 times more than these on sale. 5 times more when not on sale.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Not Sure about this One
Review Text: I'm a big fan of Anker's products. They have great cellphone accessories, headphones, and chargers for reasonable prices. Maybe these buds are their super budget-friendly version, but they didn't quite live up to the Anker name. They sound ok, and the phone quality was good. While listening to music and podcasts, the sound between the buds wouldn't be in sync. It was like I was hearing an echo. It would eventually correct itself, but it was happening enough times that it was disturbing my enjoyment. I will say the buds are comfortable to wear.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: I want to love them but...
Review Text: These were my first headphones from this brand and I've heard great things about them which is why I tried them out the noise cancellation is spectacular and a battery life is even better but the reason why I had to return them is because the ear plugs have issues staying connected primarily the right earbud disconnects and no matter how many times you try to repair it it doesn't want to connect. I bought an additional pair of thinking that mines were faulty but it turns out this is an issue that is common to this earbud hence why I cannot recommend this product although the brand is a great brand and makes others spectacular products this specific earbud model I do not recommend.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Not a lot of dynamic range.
Review Text: The sound is a little too flat for me. Highs and lows are not there. Connectivity is good but sound quality is limited. Worth the price, probably but I'd personally would rather pay more for better quality.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Okay for the price
Review Text: I am trying to find the style of earbud that works best for me. These were an "upgrade" from a pair bought at Five Below. The sound is good. They hold a good charge. They do tend to slip out of my ears. I think I need to try the larger bud piece. Overall these earbuds are okay. I can't say I love them or that they are the best pair of earbuds I have ever had, though.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Decent
Review Text: I'm new to this bluetooth earbud world. For 30 bucks they're alright. Instrument separation leaves a lot to be desired. Nasty sibilance in some songs. I was hopeful for a bit more but I think I will keep them. They will be good for the gym. I'll definitely invest more into my next pair for all-purpose use.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Poor Support
Review Text: These actually have really good sound, especially at this price. The lost star is due to the lack of an actual manual-you only get the "Quick Start Guide" (which says the complete manual is available online). Trying to figure out their hieroglyphics (see pic) was just annoying, so I went to their website looking for the full manual, except there isn't one. I confirmed this w/ the chat procedure, so I emailed them, and received no answer. I finally figured things out by looking at the manual for their model P2. Turns out, these have no volume control, which is no big deal-you have that on your phone. Also, you can only shut these off by placing back in their case-no ON/Off on the buds. Quick guide also indicates there is a built in equalizer...

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: A strong contender
Review Text:
I own wireless earbuds, from different manufacturers, but these just dethroned my Samsung Galaxy Buds as my favorite. Amazing sound quality, the bass hits hard without drowning out the mids and highs. I listen to a wide variety of music, everything from country to show tunes to rock to hip hop to punk, and every genre has sounded great.

The noise cancelation is decent, but I've experienced better from other earbuds. I can't comment on the call quality, as I use these strictly for music. I tried out the various equalizer settings through the app and settled on Acoustic and I have yet to find a song it doesn't sound great on.

If you're looking for a great pair of earbuds under $100, look no further than these.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Nice Wireless Earbuds
Review Text: They look and sound good. Also, connecting them to my smartphone and iPad could not have been easier. The sound quality is very good and are perfect for my applications which are listening to music and watching movies on the aforementioned devices. They are my first pair of earbuds, so I don't know how they compare to other brands or models, but for my needs they are just fine.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Nice ear buds
Review Text: The controls for these ear buds are very easy. They are simple and have a nice clean design. Easy to work. They do slightly hurt my ears though and slip out semi easily.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Good headphones for the price.
Review Text: These are a solid set of earbuds for a very low price. The sound and bass is nice, and these earphones cancel noise well. I gave 4 stars because they couldve been louder. But if you need a good wireless set to workout, listen to music, podcasts, whatever floats your boat, these are a good value.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Great value
Review Text: Works just as advertised. Definitely recommended that you try one the different silicone tips to see which fits your ear the best otherwise the buds will start to shift or fall out with movement and wont sound as well.  Decent mic quality on calls and great playback time, charges fast in the case.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Great Buy 4 the Price
Review Text: Excellent headphones for the price. Best feature, I'd right out of the box they are charged and the charge lasts! Second best feature, is they are very confortable. Third, best feature, Is they are noise canceling. No more people complaining of the wind hitting the set while I'm outside running my escooter. Downside, wish it had more bass, but for the price I'd take these over Apple.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: Love these!
Review Text: Amazing sound quality, fits comfortably in my ear and lasts all day for me. Not too great for phone calls though. People say I sound too far away and can't hear me even when i move my hair away from my ear. But if you just wanna listen to music or watch stuff, these are great. I like how you can pause songs by tapping one earbud twice and even skip songs by holding down the right earbud and replaying/going back to songs by holding down the left one. Very convenient to use and I've had them for a few months now.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: First earbuds
Review Text:
These are my first earbuds. The sound quality is really good. I'm having a hard time figuring out to answer a call, but I am confident it is operator error and not the earbuds. 
Great earbuds and great price.

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour

The microphone works well so I'm able to be over 25 ft from my phone and the call comes in clear still. Worth it but wish it wasn't so expensive!

Product Name: Back to soundcore by Anker- Life Note C Earbuds True Wireless Headphones, 10mm Driver, IPX5, 8/32-Hour
Title: First Soundcore Product: Solid
Review Text: I've never used a Soundcore product before, but I have used about a dozen different headsets before, big and small. These have a good battery life, they're comfy, they sound good, and they stay in the ear. The case is a little bulky, so depending on how much your going to be carrying them, this could be an issue. Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: Beats??? More like deadbeats.
Review Text:
Really expected more from this brand. 

Only giving this two stars because they work. 



Pros- 
Color (red) is nice and makes finding them easier when they constantly fall from my ear holes. 

Pairing is super easy, and battery status display is nice.  This way you can keep track of how quickly the battery life is depleting in the charging case, and your ear buds.  

Cons:

Battery does not last in buds or case. One charge and it is depleted. 

Not secure in your ear and falls out constantly. 

Incessant notifications of battery level, that begins at 20% and flashes on and off your screen non stop!! Mine is currently doing it right now!! 

Save your money, and just get the darn AirPods 

Yup, still doing it

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: It is Ok for the price
Review Text:
I received these Beats Studio Buds as a holiday gift. So far, the wireless earbuds are decent.
Design: The small case features a sleek design with a streamlined look and bold branding. It's easy to carry around. The charging cable is USB-C to USB-C, and it comes with 2 extra silicon ear-tips.
Fitting: Due to my small ears, the buds don't stay in, and I had to purchase custom ear tips for them to stay in place.
Connectivity: They connect effortlessly to the iPhone, almost as if they were AirPods.
Control: Each bud has a physical control button that allows you to play/pause, play the previous track, or turn them off. However, adjusting the volume using the control button is not possible.
Battery: The battery only lasts around 3 hours before n...

Pros- 
Color (red) is nice and makes finding them easier when they constantly fall from my ear holes.

Cons:

Save your money, and just get the darn AirPods

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: Great sound quality
Review Text: I was given these headphones as a gift to support my love of music. The sound quality of this product is amazing and the noise cancellation feature works wonders. I have rather small ears and find the ear buds constantly slipping out even with the smallest bud possible in use, although I have this issue with all headphones. The battery lasts about 3-4 hours of continuous use and the cases ability to charge the buds back up is nice. My biggest complaint is that I am not able to charge the case and one ear bud while the other is in use.

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: Compact and nice sounding earbuds.

They sit in my ear comfortably without any worries of losing them if I choose to take them along on a jog. Battery is good for the time I have used them. Noise cancellation is not bad but can be a bit noisy while outside on a windy day.

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: Best sound quality but falls off the ear most times

Would recommend them only if you use them at school or in a office or studio but not for exercising since they tend to fall out the ear a lot.

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black

Product Name: Back to Beats Studio Buds ‚Äì True Wireless Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds - Black
Title: Okay earbuds
Review Text:
I'll keep my review short and sweet. These earbuds are a great option for anyone looking for a pair of true wireless earbuds that offer a sleek design,  balanced sound, and active noise cancellation. It's handy that they're compatible with both Apple and Android devices, and support spatial audio for a more immersive listening experience. 

However, they also have some pretty glaring drawbacks, such as pretty mediocre call quality, lack of an Apple H1 chip (which makes a seamless transition from one Apple device to another not possible), and average battery life. They are not the best in their class, but they are still worth considering for their price and performance.

With contemporary Jazz and classical music they are heard very well.  If you are Latin and you like reguethon, these are the ones.  With HD music they sound great.  I have the MW07, MW08, MH40, powerbeats pro and beats studio 3. All very good with their differences in definition and fidelity.  Anyone who wants fidelity in sound should look for something more expensive that suits his preferences.  For me these are very good for their price.  If you are not willing to pay $ 250 for the MW07 or $ 300 for the MW08 you should seriously consider these earbuds.

Product Name: Back to VIZIO 65" Class V-Series 4K UHD LED Smart TV V655-J09
Title: Great Experience, Except for Suggestion of Tipping
Review Text: Both TVs were delivered promptly and in good working order.  Very good value!  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was the prompt of a tip for the delivery driver -- suggested $50 ! Title: Poor battery
Review Text: I bought a Charge 4 approximately five years ago and then upgraded to a charge 5 within the past year or so. Recently I used both for an outdoor party and the charge 4 lasted six hours and the charge 5 lasted only three.  Both were on full volume the entire time playing similar music.  So the battery on the Charge 5 lasted only half as long as the charge 4 which is about four years older.  The sound is excellent and easily filled a large outdoor space but the battery just wasn't up to par.

Title: Needs Major Function Improvement For Stereo Mode!!
Review Text: I got two Charge 5's to work in stereo mode. However, they provide no way to set stereo mode from the units unless you use the JBL Portable app. Whats more, the units do not save this mode once you power them off like the app says. So you have to go into the app everytime you power them on to put them in stereo mode. Not to mention some phones will simply time out their connections because it takes so long to connect to the device to set them up. So stereo isn't possible if your phone cant handle it (tried on phones with android 8 to 11). I've had the Sony XB30s for 4 years, and they remember their stereo state once connected, unfortunately they have tons of connectivity reset issues and were terrible to work with. The only deal breaker for...

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Nice upgrade.
Review Text: I went down the review line and read this reviews and nobody seems to mention the sound muffle if you are holding the charge 5 on the exclamation j side. The tweeter is producing most of the sound. I reviewed the charge 4 and the only gripe I had with that was to move the driver to the center instead of one side for balanced  sound  that way if you grab it from any end you still hear sound instead of blockage. It's the same with the charge 5 you have to watch how you hold or grab it to not block sound. Sound quality is amazing just wish they could of move the smaller jbl logo to the upper right or left side and put the single driver dead in the center. Just my humble opinion. Still great product more power better sound nice exterior design.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Great speaker, BUT ONE PROBLEM
Review Text: Music quality is great on this speaker, better than my Charge 3, and 100x better than the Extreme 2.  BUT, I cannot get phone call ring sounds, text message notification sounds, or other notification sounds to come thru the speaker. Therefore, when connected to the speaker and listening to music, I have no idea if my phone rings or if I get a text message or other notification.  I have tried with an iPad Pro, an iPhone 8 and with an iPhone 11, all having the newest iOS software.  And I have updated the Charge 5 too,   BUT, I have no problem with this on my Charge 3, as all phone call ring sounds, text sounds and other notification sounds, from all 3 Apple devices, come thru just fine on the Charge 3.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Great sound, sturdy build
Review Text: The sound is fantastic. I'm actually surprised at how well it sounds. I use this during my CPR/AED, First Aid, Overdose Awareness classes. My concern was it would be muddled so those in the back of the class couldn't hear the videos that we play to highlight the information. But that is not an issue with this. The build quality is also fantastic. Very sturdy build. Only reason I did not give it a five star rating isn't about the quality of the product but the quality of the custom print. We have two, round, logos on each side and both have been stretched horizontally so they are more oval now.

The one thing is that the paint seems to have a certain texture throughout the speaker, and it feels sort of sticky. So too, the startup sounds are very quiet and the buttons on the speaker are difficult to know you've pressed them.

They assured me it would be exactly as I saw it in the 3-D rendering, they said this over and over. I even sent in a version so JBL could tell me if there were any sections where it did not print, or show me where it wouldn't print.   It is *nowhere near* what I created in their 3-D rendering page.  There is a huge portion on the bottom that has no printing whatsoever, even though in the 3-D planning, it is a full 360¬∞ wrap.  Also, the printing already shows signs...

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Definitely Hefty
Review Text: I bought this because my charge 4 on/off button stopped working. I loved my charge 4.  This one is a bit bigger and a bit heavier, but nowhere near the heftiness of the pulse 5.  The sound is pretty good, but doesn't seem to have the deep base sound like the 4 did.  As for as loudness I'm not sure as I haven't had a purpose yet to test that feature out, but summer we shall see.  And the party boost feature while nice, the connection isn't a solid smooth one it seems to by spotty and the speakers were less than 5 feet away with no interference. And I'm not liking that I can't connect to my older jbl speakers.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Amazing speaker
Review Text: Bought this for my wife, she absolutely loves it.  The bass is great and will rattle the windows, yet the mids and highs are clear and crisp.  The battery life is amazing and I love that you can charge your device with the speaker.  Portability is the forte of this speaker, take it out to the patio or the beach and crank the tunes.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Amazing!
Review Text: I have had the JBL Charge 5 red speaker for a few years now and the sound quality is still the same since I bought it. The volume is so loud and great for outdoor use. My vacuum is pretty loud, and with the volume not that high, it overpowers the sound of the vacuum. This speaker is especially awesome while floating rivers. I buy all my speakers from JBL because the quality never disappoints. My JBL speakers have been on so many adventures.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: The best sound
Review Text:
A useful thing if you like to listen to music.
Holds a charge for a long time.Charges quickly. It's not heavy. It connects to your favorite phone and more very quickly. You can carry it with you in your bag and take it on any trip. Water-repellent. Once you buy it, you listen for life.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Love It!!!
Review Text: Not only is the sound on this speaker amazing, but I can now enjoy my music while also enjoying the picture of me and my baby girl, who got her wings almost 4 months ago. üíïüêæ The picture is awesome and came out just as the example showed after creating it. Thank you for such great work. I can enjoy my music with impeccable sound, and a favorite photo at the same time.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: JNP Charge 5
Review Text:
Good sounding portable Bluetooth speaker. Easy to set up and operate. Nice size and shape, easily fits in a lot of places. Ran this speaker at low volume several hours per day for several days and the battery dropped approximately 50%. This speaker will do lots of run time between charges. 
Love it.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Great Speaker, Great Seller
Review Text: Speaker is impressive for its size. The bass is great and the app is cool. The seller is great, shipped my order quickly and it got delivered within 2days. I also requested to change the color of the speaker a hour or so after I placed the order and the seller had no problem doing so. That is good service if you ask me.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Worth to buy. Awesome look.
Review Text: Another wonderful piece from JBL. Great for personal use like in room, pool or beach. I like the new shape with their new big logo on it. Clear sound with awesome bass. Its not very handy like flip which you can easily carry in any small bag.  Its really wort to buy. I have just got it two days so cant say anything about battery. But hoping it will be good.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Great sound quality
Review Text: The JBL charge 5 speaker definitely bumbs. The sound quality is amazing. And the charge last along time. It also has a nice carrying strap to hold on to. It's also waterproof! I highly suggest this one!!

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: It's bluetooth 5.1 and has a twenty hour battery .
Review Text: I bought a personalized charge 5 for Christmas and it looks good and sounds good. I would of bought another one if I could of got it for the same price

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: I know speakers
Review Text: Having been the speaker engineer for Soundstream, PPI, and a few other brands, I know speakers. A colleague friend bought one of these to listen to on the jobsite. I was surprised at how good it sounded. For the compact size of this unit, the bass is impressive. The dual radiators do their job well. I ordered a custom one with my company logo on it. Lovin' it!

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: great buy and a fair price!
Review Text: very satisfied! Impressed on how accurate the color is on the website compared to real life (i bought a customized one.) i firmly believe the price is well justified and the newly found app support to change the EQ settings, update the software of the speaker and rename it is very much welcomed. i have recommened this product to several friends and all of which have purchased one after seeing mine. and to go along with that the party boost settings are amazing and really bring out the emmersion in whatever is being played.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Customization was so spot on!
Review Text:
I knew the speaker was going to be amazing quality as others I have purchased in the past and it is.  This time I did the customization and I have to say it came out exactly how I saw it designed online.  I was super amazed and pleased with the final product.  

I did have trouble the at first adding my customization to the cart, but after waiting a few days I tried again and was then able to add it.  The speaker arrived in about 2 weeks, only every time I looked at the status of my speaker online it was never updated and I never received shipping information.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Absolutely Incredible for the Size
Review Text:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am typically not a speaker consumer, but after using the Charge 5, I am finding so many ways to use it.

For years I have enjoyed JBL products - primarily headphones and earbuds. However, this device, along with its amazing quality, price point, and set of features, will make me a fan and purchaser of their small(er) speaker line of products.
The dimensions (8.5" wide x 3.5" high) were such that I figured it would be a fun speaker to have on the golf course with buddies. The sound was so deep, rich and loud that it didn't take long for the buddies to ask what this was. We listened to a variety of our catalogs - below were the big takeaways:
-Notorious B.I.G. - While the bass was powe...

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Amazing Quality
Review Text: As per all Jbl products i own they're Amazing. I had one of the speakers i currently own for a year and it's still going, other brands have never lasted for this long. I'm glad i invested in JBL products and i plan to stick with JBL for the rest of my audio equipment

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Get them- they're worth every penny!
Review Text: I bought a pair of these a month ago and I am over the moon with them. I pair them in Party Mode and then they play in stereo. They are LOUD, have awesome clarity, and amazing bass! They sound great with all styles of music. The battery life is phenomenal and they charge back up really quickly. I am a musician and an audiophile so I expect a lot and I was not disappointed! They're extremely rugged and well built. JBL has a winner here, I highly recommend these!

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Durable for Outdoor use
Review Text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I needed a new speaker for work but needed something durable.I was hesitant to get this because looked too sexy to take to industrial environment.I took a chance and glad i did.Not only is this a beauty its a beast.The build quality is top notch the rubber sides and grill make me feel confident it will hold its own out here.Battery life is great i currently work 12 hours due to being short handed during pandemic and it has about 25% battery at end of shift while playing at about 75% volume.The type C charging port charges it up real quick about 1 hour or so.I haven't got it wet but i have got it dirty.Overall im happy and recommed if looking for something rugged yet pretty.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Great for all occasions!
Review Text: Wow! Is the only word I can think of. This speaker is amazing! Not only is it compact. Waterproof and lightweight, it bumps the music so nicely. Perfect for any outdoor activities. We bought this over a year ago and it's still perfect. Connects quickly without static and plays perfectly at any volume.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Sounds Great, but takes a long time to receive.
Review Text: If you're wanting this for a special occasion, make sure you order way ahead of time.  It was ordered two and half weeks before my birthday and it didn't show up until 5 days after my birthday.  But other than that, it looks great and sounds great.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: JBL Charge 5 Review
Review Text: I like that it was easy to sync to my bluetooth on iphone 15 Max Pro and the sound is absolutely positivity great with great bass.  However, the device had a defect that would not shut down when the power button is pressed.  I had to return it for exchange or refund.

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black

Product Name: Back to JBL Charge 5 Portable Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker with Powerbank, Black
Title: Beautiful in stereo
Review Text:
i bought a xtreme3 and it sounded good, but very localized. I read some reviews and watched some youtube, and decided to return it. I bought 2 of the charge5 for 20 less and couldnt be happier. bass is comparable, but the spread of sound is very impressive when they are put in stereo mode at 12 feet apart. Doesn't Thump but can easily play loud enough  that you cant hear a conversation without shouting. great sound, good bass for pop, rock and solid connection to my ipod BT.

Highly recommended until the xtreme3 drops to a realistic 179-199 price point.

I stood there like an idiot, holding that button, before I realized the top volume is about like a loud whisper in your ear. 
That multi-function button is a mess, too. With modern electronics, you know it won't be long before it gets mushy and hard to control. You'll have to learn the push-combos ahead of time, and remember them on-the-fly.
These headphones get two stars, but only because of the decent noise-cancelling function. The "headphones" function gets Zero stars.

Title: Very nice upgrade

Product Name: Back to 2022 Apple 10.9-inch iPad Air Wi-Fi 64GB - Space Gray (5th Generation)
Title: Great for school!
Review Text: I absolutely love my iPad! I had an iPad mini years ago, and this iPad is amazing compared to it! It's great for school notes and assignments. I love using my Apple Pencil with it and how seamlessly it connects with my phone and apps. It's the perfect size, as it is easily transportable for the car and for my desk. It's very fast, and writing and typing on the screen is so satisfying! I would definitely recommend this product.

Product Name: Back to 2022 Apple 10.9-inch iPad Air Wi-Fi 64GB - Space Gray (5th Generation)
Title: Works Great and Saved A Bundle
Review Text:
I'm leaving this review using the tablet I'm reviewing. I've had it for over six months and it's been fantastic. I really like the amount of memory that I got. I'd think it's necessary and it's been working great since day one. This was my first iPad and I couldn't be happier if I transitioned from android for my phone and tablet to Apple products and I've really enjoyed the simplicity and intuitive way they are designed.

This tablet holds a good charge and it doesn't take long to charge it. There's a lot of added apps that Apple supplies, and I'm really enjoying those. I'm using the dictation feature right now to leave this review and it works excellently. I couldn't be happier with my 10.9 inch iPad Air.

Product Name: Back to 2022 Apple 10.9-inch iPad Air Wi-Fi 64GB - Space Gray (5th Generation)
Title: As expected
Review Text: I really am glad I decided on my new iPad Air 5th Generation instead of an Android tablet.  The iPad Air was very easy to setup with all of my Apps and my iCloud information was copied flawlessly onto my new iPad.  Do yourself a favor if you are thinking about buying a iPad Air definitely buy the model with the largest memory as there is no adding to it.  Also, I thought about getting a laptop instead, but I decided on an iPad Air 5 instead for the ease of holding it and by buying a iPad and adding a keyboard folio, it's just like a laptop anyway.

Product Name: Back to Straight Talk Apple iPhone 11, 64GB, Black - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
Title: Struggle was real! You just gotta know what to do!
Review Text: The problem that you have when you buy the phone online at walmart.com. They don't tell you that you have 14 days to return or exchange it. I brought 2 iPhone 11 on black friday for Christmas for my kids. I tried to activate them, but I couldn't on Christmas Eve. That's because walmart.com doesn't scan the serial number and the IMEI bar code before you get it. That's makes it look like no one brought the phone so it seems stolen to the carrier. You have to go to a Walmart store in customer service and show them proof on your online receipt along with your phones. They have to scan both the serial number and the IMEI bar codes to activate them by price overriding to 0 dollars and then call straight talk to handle the rest. Problem Solved.

Product Name: Back to Straight Talk Apple iPhone 11, 64GB, Black - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
Title: Don't like Face ID
Review Text: Face ID is inconvenient. It only recognizes 75% of time. I didnt realize how often I touch the phone just to check it without having it in front of my face. Ie: for the clock, the timer, to see if msg came in, to glance at map, etc. it is particularly unsafe to not be able to turn this feature off in the car. The seconds used to look at your phone to turn it on for yourself or to turn it on for a passenger (who doesn't need to know the password) mean seconds when your attention is not on the road. It is ridiculous to not have a fingerprint option or to be able to unlock your phone indefinitely -at least when driving.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Walmart stole my money!!!
Review Text: I was delivered an empty box. Spent hours on the phone with Walmart. At first they told me to call FedEx. And then they told me I have to call my financial institution. I called FedEx and they said that Walmart simply needs to file a claim with them, and that it will get paid and research. Chances are, since the box was repackaged at their facility, it was lost or stolen. Walmart hung up on me three times and has literally stolen hundreds of dollars  from me.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Disappointing experience with walmart-purchased
Review Text: I'm disappointed with my purchase of the second-generation AirPods Pro from Walmart. Upon receiving the product, I noticed that the box lacked the protective plastic that usually indicates it hasn't been previously opened. Additionally, the security seal was broken, and the box was dirty, suggesting potential tampering or prior handling. This lack of integrity in the packaging raises concerns about the authenticity and condition of the product. As a consumer, I expected to receive a new and unaltered product, which wasn't the case this time. This experience has been quite disappointing, and I hope for a resolution or clarification from Walmart to ensure the quality and authenticity of their products.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Fake Airpods, BEWARE!
Review Text: Connected them to my iPhone - seems to connect easily, but the button doesn't switch between ANC and Transparency modes. Reset everything, still didn't work. Annoying low quality indicator sounds every time I put them in my ears - I compare this to the very real Airpods my girlfriend has, they don't do that. Checked the serial numbers - shows a serial number of 1st Gen, not 2nd, even though the case seems to be of 2nd Gen. Also, packaging says assembled in Vietnam, Walmart stickers says assembled in China. Lots of odd things, bottom line it doesn't work, they aren't real airpods.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Amazing product, would recommend a 100%.
Review Text:
The Apple AirPods Pro are a remarkable addition to Apple's audio accessory lineup, delivering an exceptional listening experience in a sleek and compact design. With their distinct white appearance against a clean white background, these wireless earbuds exude a sense of modernity and sophistication.

One of the standout features of the AirPods Pro is their active noise cancellation technology. It effectively blocks out external noise, allowing users to fully immerse themselves in their music or podcasts. The transparency mode is also worth mentioning, as it lets users hear their surroundings without needing to remove the earbuds.

Comfort is another area where the AirPods Pro shine. They come with three different sizes of silicone ear tips...

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Best Airpods to get
Review Text: Ive had all the AirPods (besides the Max) and i can say that these are the best,i really enjoy the ‚Äúfind my‚Äù features and the sound quality, it's a little pricey but still worth it in my opinion,i mean it is an APPLE product,also LOVE the speed on the Usbc charger provided.Lightning wouldn't be the phase i would say as how fast /charges

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Apple does not miss with these!
Review Text:
Apple makes amazing products. Depending on who you are, some of their products amazed you and made you fall in love with the brand. 

These AirPods Pro 2nd generation made me fall in love with Apple all over again. 

I wear these at the gym and have had 0 issues. I bought these again for the rare times they lose their charge.

If you are looking for a pair of headphones for literally any reason, buy these. If you have an iPhone, buy these headphones.
If you want to see why people fanboy over Apple, buy these headphones.

I would write more but I will let the AirPods do the talking.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Buy It!!
Review Text: I was skeptical to purchase when I saw the reviews but decided to purchase them and received my order today. The box was sealed and I am very happy because I could use my MagSafe charger with it. I love my new AirPod Pros, they're an upgrade from the 2nd generation AirPods I had. I like the Pros better than the regular AirPods. I won't discount the reviews because everyone's experience is different but personally I am having a great experience.

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Durable!
Review Text: This is my second pair. My first pair last through countless washes and even one dry. I'm only replacing them because the washes have affected sound quality a bit. Not that much! That's what's crazy. Imagine if you were extremely careful how durable these will be??

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: Fantastic!
Review Text: These airpods are life-changing. Absolutely incredible. I can't stop using them. It's like being in love. I think it must be the use of Apple Vision technology   AI, but the clarity and dynamic range is mind-blowing. I'm guessing it's the AI but when you have an ensemble of many instruments   voices, you can hear virtually every one of them individually. There's none of the characteristic ‚Äòsoupiness' you normally get. And it seems to work on older recordings where the AI seems to my ears to actually enhance and improve on the original recording. Honestly, I'm completely blown away!

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)
Title: AirPods Pro
Review Text: The AirPods Pro truly excel in both music listening and business calls, offering a superior performance that outshines previous generations. With the ability to answer calls using voice commands and seamlessly read notifications from your iPhone, they enhance productivity and convenience. Moreover, their improved design ensures a secure fit, addressing the issue of previous generations falling out. Despite the higher price tag, the enhanced features and overall experience make the AirPods Pro a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking top-notch wireless earbuds!

Product Name: Back to AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB‚ÄëC)

Review Text: This opened box iPad was in perfect condition! It looks and feels new and it works with no issues whatsoever. They did an amazing job refurbishing. The add ons like the cover and screen protector  and also the pen were great the pods not so much. Haven't been able to get them to pair. But that's ok, we don't need them. Overall, this was a great purchase! Very happy! If I was to make one little suggestion is about the packaging. Although it was wrapped in bubble wrap it was still a bit loose in the fe d ex box and they can be not so gentle. I would stuff the package to avoid shaking of the product.

Review Text: This item was only $299 because it was an open box return. There's not supposed to be anything wrong with it, and it should have all the accessories that come with an iPad Pro. The fast charger is an off brand made in Vietnam, and after 15 minutes of use became very hot. I had to unplug it. The airPods are called ‚ÄúInPods‚Äù, and were made in China. They are not Apple! Product Name: Back to Restored | Apple iPad Pro | 10.5-inch | Newest OS | 64GB | Wi-Fi Only | Bundle: Case, Pre-Installed Tempered Glass, Rapid Charger, Bluetooth/Wireless Airbuds By Certified 2 Day Express
Title: A Good Buy,  But Read the Description Carefully
Review Text: The Good News: Definitely worth it; But‚Ä¶ Read the description carefully! You'll be getting an iPad Pro OR an iPad Retina. I thought I was buying an iPad Pro but received an iPad Retina instead. The device was in extremely good condition and is working very well. After I got over my initial disappointment, I restored my iPad Pro configuration and data (which had been crushed while closing a Murphy bed) to this iPad Retina successfully. As part of the restore, I upgraded the device to iOS 17.

Title: Good price for something nice

The iPad is in good shape

Battery life iffy
Seems to be good sometimes and others not so good. Gets hot after continuous use playing games for over an hour

Product Name: Back to Restored | Apple iPad Pro | 10.5-inch | Newest OS | 64GB | Wi-Fi Only | Bundle: Case, Pre-Installed Tempered Glass, Rapid Charger, Bluetooth/Wireless Airbuds By Certified 2 Day Express
Title: Great Device
Review Text: I bought this I Pad to replace an old Blackberry device I had been using for email.  The I Pad has so much more power and is much more versatile.  I am using it to read books, listen to my music and to get emails and take photos.  I especially like the fingerprint recognition system and the personal passcode features.  This is my first Apple purchase and I am very happy that I bought it.  The delivery was very quick and I was able to get the device in the colour I wanted.   It was not available at "other" stores that carry Apple products.

Product Name: Back to Restored | Apple iPad Pro | 10.5-inch | Newest OS | 64GB | Wi-Fi Only | Bundle: Case, Pre-Installed Tempered Glass, Rapid Charger, Bluetooth/Wireless Airbuds By Certified 2 Day Express
Title: Replacement for my personal laptop
Review Text:
I usually have my work laptop but I don't have a personal laptop and I thought to get the iPad pro to be my personal laptop. It does 90% of I needed to do however i still need to get adapter to read sd card and transfer pictures 

One last point you must get the Smart Keyboard and Apple Pencil if you want to get the full potential of this iPad. 
Apple Pencil is awesome for taking notes in a meeting

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: AVOID 'ONN' BRAND FOR FLASH MEMORY CARD NEEDS
Review Text: Don't buy the private label 'Onn' flash memory cards from Walmart. My 128GB MicroSDXC card failed within 5 months of normal usage on my Android phone. It worked great when it worked. The Walmart's 'Lifetime Limited Warranty' means nothing as the naming implies on the retail packaging. It's basically either a 30-day return policy for in-store purchases OR up to a maximum of 90-day return policy for online orders. IF the memory card happens to fail within those 90-days, then you can call their customer service line 1-888-516-2630 to file a warranty claim and they'll instruct you to go a local Walmart near you with the original product

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: Hit write limit after a week.
Review Text:
Bought this card for a project, used it for about a week before it reached write limit and decided to give out on me. For those of you using on a Switch or something that you ABSOLUTELY MUST have the data on. You will do yourself a favor by buying another brand while this works now, it's only a matter of time before it breaks. There's an incredibly low write limit on these cards and you will reach it. 

Not today, maybe not tomorrow, but it's not a matter of if but when.

I gave this brand my trust for a bit and it betrayed it. I'm pretty sure that these are just a bad batch relabeled from another manufacturer whose name starts with San and ends with Disk.

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: Broke it while removing from packaging - Fragile
Review Text: Lifetime limited warranty . . . The lifetime for my ONN 32GB micro SD card was very short. It didn't survive removal from the packaging. I'm surprised that no other reviewers mentioned the nearly impossible to penetrate packaging. Two micro SD cards and an adapter came mounted on sturdy cardboard sheet.  No removal instructions or warnings are given.  Each component is encased inside a clear plastic tenacious bubble. Surgical tools are needed to remove the items without damage.  I broke one micro SD card while removing it.  It split down the center while removing the plastic shroud it was encased in.  I didn't see the damage until I attempted to install it into my new Dash Cam.  Yes, I was in my car and the only tools I had were a razor kni...

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: It's OK, and cheap
Review Text:
It worked...
I tested it with H2testw V 1.4.... 25.4 Meg/sec write, 28.2 Meg/sec read   
Claimed speed is 50 meg/sec write, 'Up to" 100 meg/sec read.
Returned it.   BTW... it is not my computer, I have other cards that test at 135 m/s write, and 145  m/s read

FSCTL_ALLOW_EXTENDED_DASD_IO OK
GuiFormat version 1.02 x86 Windows version 0601 64 bit
Size : 62GB 121286656 sectors
512 Bytes Per Sector, Cluster size 32768 bytes
Capacity: 62,083,530,520 bytes  that does not meet the industry standard or even close to it
second card was 62,081,826,816 bytes

even 63.2 billion bytes  would have been acceptable 

my sony SD card is 16GB 15...

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: SD CARD - AVOID ANYTHING OVER 32GB
Review Text: AVOID anything over 32GB, as they are formatted with the EXFAT filesystem internally, and cannot be changed. Upon receiving this SD CARD, tons of files were damaged. The card was good, and stores lots of data, on the flip side.

Product Name: Back to onn. 32GB Class 10 U1 MicroSDHC Flash Memory Card
Title: Satisfied
Review Text: I buy these for my Garmin Drive Assist 51.   Because the Garmin dashcam feature is constantly recording everything on every trip (including my speed, GPS coordinates, and the time), as well as cooking in the sunlight when the car is parked, the Flash memory cards wear out after a couple of months and the Garmin notifies me when they need to be replaced. I have tried other brands (Sandisk, PNY) and ONN performs just as well.  A MIL spec part certified for extended temperatures may do better, but it costs more and is difficult to find.

Title: Fun little camera
Review Text:
This camera has been pretty fun to use. It came with everything you need to get started: camera, batteries, film, and wrist strap. This would be fun for kids, teens, and adults!

Pros: 
-easy to read instructions
-ergonomic design
- cute color (in my opinion)
- easy to use for any person
-four light settings
-small for particular type of camera

Cons:
-flash goes off on all light settings
-pictures have over bright coloring unless in extremely bright outdoor light

Title: Read instructions and Watch YouTube videos
Review Text:
I highly recommend you to read the instructions and watch YouTube videos to learn tips on how to take good pictures or else your pictures will look crappy. Your pictures are not meant to be crystal clear photography style. It's supposed to add vintage classic pictures from back in the day. 
The camera is kind of big and a tiny bit heavy. It comes with batteries! It's crazy that it takes 4 AA batteries. I highly recommend to take your pictures with a background behind you like a wall. Second, if you take a selfie, your picture will be a little blurry but you can tell who is in the picture. If you take a group picture too far then it will come out blurry. So I suggest 4 to 5 feet away from the person your taking a picture of will come out gr...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: So cute!
Review Text: This camera is so cute! I love how it comes in a bunch of fun colors. My plastic packaging was a bit damaged when it arrived but everything seems ok. I would definitely want to pick up a case to protect it. At first the directions seemed pretty lengthy but it didn't take me long to look them over and figure it out. I easily attached the wrist strap, inserted the batteries, and the film. I was able to turn it on and adjust the exposure setting with no problem. I love how all of the photos have a vintage film look. I know that some models of the instax camera have a selfie mirror but unfortunately this one doesn't, so it's a bit tricky to try to take pictures that way. Also, the minimum shooting range of this camera is about 2 feet and I'm ra...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Awesome Camera
Review Text:
I really like this camera so far. Its very easy to use with not a lot of fuss. The shell of the camera is durable and made from good quality plastic. It runs on 4 AA batteries which are included as well as fuji's branded instant film which is the only shortcoming I found, but I'll get to that shortly. It also comes with a lanyard to secure it to your wrist. The camera itself is a little bulky so you won't be fitting it in your pocket, but sits comfortably in your hand when taking pictures. 

There isn't a lot going on as far as buttons on the device. You pull out the camera lenses to turn the unit on. Once its on you look through the view finder and snap photos. The photo starts to print instantly coming with within a few seconds from the...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Cute & Fun Polaroid Camera
Review Text: This cute and fun polaroid camera is very user friendly and heavy duty. It has a solid design, however, the base is very round and the feet on the bottom are small, so sometimes it falls over when standing. To turn on the camera it is a easy pull of the lens and the lights on the back make it easy to know if it is on or if the battery is dying. It comes with a string handle which makes holding the camera more secure. The capture button is perfectly placed making it easy to capture photos. There are a few different settings depending on lighting and the flash will always go off, so you can not use this in a place that does not permit flash photography. finding film has been easy and available in many different stores. The pictures are a grea...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Cute camera
Review Text: This pink Fuji film camera is super cute! I love that these cameras come in pastel colors, which in my opinion makes this product stand out more. Was my husband a little disappointed I got the pink over blue ? Maybe, but he said that won't stop him from using it. I've never owned a Fuji film camera before so I did have to read the instructions as I had zero experience with one. I trust that this is a quality product as Fuji film has been around for a long time. The instructions allowed me to figure out how to insert the film and set it up. I was confident that taking pictures on this would be straight forward. Not going to lie, my first photo came out pretty off centered and dark. I guess it does take practice getting used to vs other point...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: I love these cameras!!!!
Review Text: These are SO much fun. My daughter has a 9, so I was so happy to get this 7+! I love that the film is interchangeable between all models, so I only have to buy one kind. Walmart has big packs of them for super cheap! I feel like this 7+ is bulkier than the newer versions but I actually like that, it feels way more sturdy‚Äîand I'm clumsy! The seafoam is way more vibrant in person, perfect mix of blue and green and very much a unisex color. It feels nice and comfy in your hand as you take a photo! I don't use it much for selfies, however, but if this is a big deal to you t...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Great gift for teens
Review Text:
This camera is a simple point-and-shoot camera, though there are different exposure control settings based on the setting for the pictures - indoor/dark, cloudy/shady, sunny/fine, or very bright/clear. You'll need to practice to get the right setting for the clearest pictures. You will also need to practice with the viewfinder. It is naturally off center, so the pictures come out cut off unless you adjust your view.

Aside from that, this camera is easy to work, and it only takes 2 minutes to figure out. To turn on the camera you pull on the lens, and close it to turn it off. It comes with a built in lens cover so you don't have to worry about keeping track of one, or taking it off before taking pictures.

Be sure to follow the instruct...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Great camera for my 10 year old daughter!
Review Text: My daughter loves her Instax mini 7+ instant camera. It's durable and easy to use. It's a pretty shade purple so my daughter likes that. After placing AA batteries on the side and then putting the instant film that came with it into the back, it was ready to use. You pull out the lens to turn it on and push back to turn off. The camera has a flash, you can adjust the lens to take photos either inside or outside. It's great that the film came with 10 sheets, after pressing the button to take a pic, it instantly comes out pretty fast. We will definitely have to buy more. The photos turn out great. She enjoys taking pictures with this camera. I love that it's the perfect size for her.

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Snap it!
Review Text: Must read instructions before being able to operate. Not always the case with me but definitely with this mini beauty. The camera is big to be considered a mini. Its cute and makes for a perfect gift for a teenager. My step daughter will get good use out of it. The accessories will help make the experience much better. Having items to place the pictures she capture in is exciting. I look forward to her finished product.

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Easy to use camera
Review Text: I love that it has the batteries with it. Assembly is easy but you're going to have to read the instructions. The first picture I took was not a picture and I shook the heck out of it thinking a picture was going to come up. It was the cover or something for the film. The next picture I took came out great. The flash is crazy bright for the home setting. I haven't tried an outside picture yet. As you can imagine there's no winding up for the next picture. It's just point and shoot. I'm sure the girls are going to fly through the film.

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: Fun, lightweight camera that does not disappoint!
Review Text: I LOVE my new Instax Mini 7+ camera! First, its got a very fun look to it! The light blue color is more of a true sky blue and I really enjoy it. I was surprised at how lightweight this camera is and how well the shape fits in my hand. It turns on and off by pulling the lens forward which I like because I don't need to worry about it accidently hitting an on and off button while I carry it in my bag. It has four settings that allow you to adjust to the light; one for indoor light, for cloudy lighting, outdoor bright light, and outdoor high bright light. It's a lot of technology for such a small camera! The camera includes batteries and a ten-photo refill. It was super easy to put together considering there was nothing to screw and unscrew. ...

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green
Title: GREAT BUY
Review Text: The delivery went well, and my package came in. I was hoping it would be cushioned, but the camera came in a thin packaging. Nothing was wrong with it, it works beautifully. Instructions, batteries, and free film was all included. This is my second time owning an INSTAX mini camera, I bought it to document my unborn baby's growth. Then later as she ages, I'll keep documenting her with the camera. I will be buying an INSTAX mini 12 soon I think? This was an amazing deal, and I couldn't miss out on it.

Product Name: Back to Fujifilm INSTAX Mini 7+ Exclusive Blister Bundle with Bonus Pack of Film (10-pack Mini Film), Seafoam Green

I do like the 165hz, freesync, and 32" display. The picture good. The screen is a bit sensitive to the touch, so avoid those fingers on the screen. Never grab the monitor where your fingers touch. Hold by the corners, safer. The brightness is a bit low, but with HDR you can increase the brightness within your computers display function. This monitor also has a speaker jack. That's a plus. The build in audio controler is just as good as the audio controller on a motherboard. A sleek design, not to heavy,  but because of the...

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Poorly thought out design
Review Text: Monitor works fine (in a quiet sort of way) but have had a few bad surprises along the way. Three issues so far - a typical VESA mount blocks the monitor connectors, LG website says "yes" speaker but none (I guess they mean a headphone jack), and the tranformer is mounted on a three prong plug and is massive so limits flexibility. The biggest disappointment so far was the connector locations for the VESA mount - they are too close to the center of the monitor back and stick straight out rather than down. Better find a very tight, small VESA mount if want it to work well (if they exist) or super spacers beyond my comfort level (already doubled up) with longer screws then what comes with the VESA mount (manual did not say how deep the screws ...

Title: Good monitor, at first.

Look elsewhere if you want a monitor that will last longer than a year.

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Extreme VA Black Smearing
Review Text:
I have heard complaints about the monitor stand but for a monitor this size, a VESA mount really is the way to go. The menu is easy to use, and when you're playing a game in a well lit area it looks great.

But as soon as it gets slightly dark in a game, the black smear effect is so horrific it feels like the frame rate drops to 60 fps. In the attached pictures I entered an indoor area and it's like I had a drunk effect attached to my screen. Everywhere I turn there is a very noticeable motion blur effect. It is actually unplayable in my opinion, I don't know how this monitor has such good reviews. This is a problem with VA panels, but I thought it would only be slightly noticeable in certain instances.

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Horrible for color, Great for budget for specs
Review Text:
If all you care about is the specs, this monitor is decent, but only due to price. If that's all you care about stop here.
If you care about the picture, this monitor is bad. This is a detailed review from a power user with perfect vision, isn't colorblind and has no glasses/contacts with multiple monitors in daily usage.
Pros
-excellent price for -1440p @165hz
-32in and Freesync compatible
-didn't have dead pixels
Cons
-color is terrible, it is beige and washed out in tone (settings cannot remedy this, regardless of what you change)
-viewing angles are really bad (compared to other VA panels)
-no dedicated power button

I am the owner of multiple other 32inch 1440p monitors (VA and IPS) can say with confidence the colors on this is poor, e...

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Really bad colors in my opinion
Review Text: I got this monitor to replace my second monitor and become my main monitor. When comparing side by side to my other AOC 1440p 144hz monitor it was night and how bad the colors were. It looks super washed out and full at times in comparison. I messed around with the on board settings and the Nvidia control panel but it didn't make enough of a difference to help how bad the colors were. I recommend this monitor more for console or single monitor use.

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Power saver feature is terrible
Review Text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Picture quality is great but the power saving feature is super frustrating. I use this as a second monitor for my work laptop, and every time my laptop goes to sleep, this monitor also goes to sleep but doesn't wake up when the laptop wakes up. I have to manually hit the power button to wake it up. Since it doesn't wake up on its own, the laptop can't see it and moves all my open windows to the first monitor so I have to move them all back manually- every time!

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: BLACK SMEARING
Review Text: Please be aware, This is a VA monitor, it has black smearing, to me it is very noticeable, to mitigate the smearing, you have to set your blacks to basically gray. It is also quite dim even at max brightness, the picture looks good, as soon as I can, I will be returning this, the price is great but the dark parts of my games are either black smearing or all the black has to be set to gray, test it for yourself, have black stabilizer set to 50 or so and go in a game to a dark chain link fence, now move your camera and watch as the chain link flashes all black. It seems that some VA monitors do not have this issue, this one does unfortunately. Attached is an example of the black smearing, the top UFO shows the smearing.

Product Name: Back to LG 32" Ultra-Gear QHD (2560 x 1440) Gaming Monitor, 165Hz, 1ms, Black 32GN600-B.Aus, New
Title: Great gaming monitor if you get a GOOD deal
Review Text: Great monitor if you get a good deal on it. This monitor is a great budget 1440p monitor. Fast response time, good colors using SDR, and you can definitely tell a difference when using 1440p. Although, I have a LG 32GN550 which I think is better overall than this monitor. This monitor does not look great when displaying at 1080p. I noticed that this monitor has more screen tearing when connected to my laptop compared to the 550. Also, this monitor does not support 165hz over HDMI. DON'T buy this monitor if you plan on using it to regularly watch HDR content. The HDR is a downgrade from the 550-B and is very dark most of the time, even with the brightness all the way up. Movies and gaming in SDR is definitely the better choice if you get thi...
